nodes.text: Celebration Anaheim was an official Star Wars Celebration fan convention held April 16–19, 2015, at the Anaheim Convention Center in Anaheim, California, home of Disneyland. Lucasfilm formally announced plans for Celebration Anaheim on July 28, 2013, at the closing ceremonies of Celebration Europe II in Essen, Germany.

While previous Celebrations had been distinguished from each other by Roman numerals similar to the live-action films, Lucasfilm decided not to continue this practice. Instead, this and future Celebrations will be designated by the year and location.

Celebration Anaheim opened with a panel on Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and also included a panel on Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. There was also a special screening of the story reel for four previously unreleased episodes of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, beginning with "The Bad Batch."
